zero-shot:
Input text:"{text}"

---

Evaluate the input text above and determine if it is written by a human or if it is generated by a large language model such as yourself. Respond with "Human" if you evaluate it as written by a human, or respond with "Generated" if you evaluate it as generated by a large language model. Do not respond with anything else.
